column1: Little Goat Diner////As for the cafe/bakery section
column2: it was very cool. They have a top-of-the-line espresso machine
column3: and they display that and the other equipment very nicely in a small counter area. It's a bit confusing
column4: as this area is located at the front of the shop
column5: but you order your coffee in the back. There's a small sign that tells you this though.
